reviewText: Trailer to the film "Klangbad: Avant-garde in the Meadows", featuring Minit, Jutta Koether, Steven W. Lobdell, Cpt. Howdy, Nista Nije Nista, Faust, Kammerflimmer Kollektief and Circle. The DVD contains a second film with the entire performance by legendary Krautrock band Faust. In conjunction with the two films play loud! also released a 7" vinyl record, the 1972 Polydor release "So far / It's a bit of pain". Faust: Live at Klangbad Festival
